named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWeblogEntry&TitleNotNull&ExcerptNotNullOrderByTotalHitsDesc
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.weblogEntry = ?1 AND r.title IS NOT NULL AND r.excerpt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.totalHits DESC

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWeblogEntry
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.weblogEntry = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsiteOrderByTotalHitsDesc
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 ORDER BY r.totalHits DESC

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&DateString&DuplicateOrderByTotalHitsDesc
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.dateString = ?2 AND r.duplicate = ?3 ORDER BY r.totalHits DESC

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&DayHitsGreaterZeroOrderByDayHitsDesc
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.dayHits > 0 ORDER BY r.dayHits DESC

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&DateString&RefererPermalink
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.dateString = ?2 AND r.refererPermalink = ?3

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&RefererUrl
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.refererUrl = ?2

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&RequestUrl&RefererUrl
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.requestUrl = ?2 AND r.refererUrl = ?3

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getByWebsite&RequestURL&TitleOrExcerpt
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND r.requestUrl = ?2 AND (r.title = ?3 OR r.excerpt = ?4)

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getHotWeblogsByWebsite.enabled&Website.active&Website.lastModifiedGreater
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(r), r.website.id, r.website.name, r.website.handle FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website.enabled = ?1 AND r.website.active = ?2 AND r.website.lastModified > ?3 GROUP BY r.website.id, r.website.name, r.website.handle

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getDaysPopularWebsitesByWebsite.enabled&Website.active
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(r.dayHits), r.website.id, r.website.name, r.website.handle FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website.enabled = ?1 AND r.website.active = ?2 GROUP BY r.website.id, r.website.name, r.website.handle

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.getHitsByWebsite.enabled&Website.id
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(r.dayHits), SUM(r.totalHits) FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website.enabled = ?1 AND r.website.id = ?2

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.clearDayHitsByWebsite
named-query.query: UPDATE WeblogReferrer r SET r.dayHits=0 where r.website = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.removeByNullOrEmptyExcerpt
named-query.query: DELETE FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.excerpt IS NULL OR r.excerpt LIKE ''

named-query.name: WeblogReferrer.removeByNullOrEmptyExcerpt&Website
named-query.query: DELETE FROM WeblogReferrer r WHERE r.website = ?1 AND (r.excerpt IS NULL OR r.excerpt LIKE '')
